Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1140 AVENUE OF THE AMERICAS 9TH FLOOR, NEW YORK, New York, 10036, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Avenue Therapeutics Inc is a specialty pharmaceutical company that develops and markets pharmaceutical products for the acute care setting. It focuses on developing its product candidate, an intravenous (IV) formulation of tramadol HCI (IV Tramadol), for post-operative acute pain.
